message:
SYSTEM: 2023.10.Hallucinations.pdf: Página 15
Trial readme example (MT)
Machine Translation
README TRIAL
{
"hyp": "I have nothing to do with it.",        
"ref": "either",        
"src": "J'en ai rien \u00e0 secouer.",        
"tgt": "I don't give a shit about it.",        
"model": "",        
"task": “MT",        
"labels": ["Hallucination",            "Not 
Hallucination",            "Hallucination"],        
"label": "Hallucination",        
"p(Hallucination)": 0.6666666666666666
}
A Traducir: SRC
Salida: HYP
TGT es lo correcto
The trial set covers 
datapoints from definition 
modeling (DM), machine 
translation (MT) and 
paraphrase generation (PG). 
All other sets should also 
include text simplification 
(TS) datapoints.
Furthermore
•
The train set will not 
contain manual 
annotations.
•
The validation and 
evaluation sets will 
involve five annotators 
per datapoint.
speaker: SYSTEM
